snippet: Juventus overcame a first-leg deficit with a 3-0 win at Fiorentina to advance, 4-2 on aggregate. Napoli hosts Lazio on Wednesday in the other semifinal.
abstract: Juventus beats Fiorentina, 3-0, to advance to Italian Cup soccer final; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Juventus overcame a first-leg deficit with a 3-0 win at Fiorentina to advance, 4-2 on aggregate. Napoli hosts Lazio on Wednesday in the other semifinal.

headline.main: Juventus Reaches Italian Cup Final by Beating Fiorentina
